    • Game

      public Game(int qte_hunter, int qte_wise, int qte_cheater, int qte_roadmap, int qte_pickaxe, int qte_ladder, int qte_wall, int qte_glue)
      Creates a new instance of the Game class with the specified quantities of different occupants and items.
      Parameters:
      qte_hunter - The quantity of Hunter occupants.
      qte_wise - The quantity of Wise occupants.
      qte_cheater - The quantity of Cheater occupants.
      qte_roadmap - The quantity of RoadMap items.
      qte_pickaxe - The quantity of Pickaxe items.
      qte_ladder - The quantity of Ladder items.
      qte_wall - The quantity of Wall items.
      qte_glue - The quantity of Glue items.

    • playARound

      public void playARound()
      Plays a round of the game. This method iterates over the occupants and performs their actions based on their type. The actions include moving, interacting with other occupants, and updating the game grid. The history of the round's actions is recorded in the "histo" ArrayList.

    • results

      public void results()
      Generates the results of the game. The method populates the 'histo' ArrayList with the game results. It checks if any player has won the game, and appends the corresponding message to the 'histo' list. If no player has won after 1000 rounds, it adds a message indicating that no one has won.
